summary.para: Provides export options for the ASPxPivotGrid control.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPivotGrid.Export.WebPivotGridOptionsPrint.PageSettings

summary.para: Provides access to the page settings to print the PivotGrid control.

Provides data for the event.

Initializes a new instance of the WebCustomExportCellEventArgs class.

member.param: An IVisualBrick object.
A PivotCellViewInfo object.
An ExportAppearanceObject object.
A PivotGridViewInfo object.
A object that specifies the Column Field that corresponds to the current cell. This value is assigned to the property.

A object that specifies the Data Field that corresponds to the current cell. This value is assigned to the property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPivotGrid.Export.WebCustomExportCellEventArgs.ColumnField

summary.para: Gets the column field that corresponds to the current cell.

member.value: A object that specifies the column field. null (Nothing in Visual Basic) if a column grand total cell is being processed.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPivotGrid.Export.WebCustomExportCellEventArgs.DataField

summary.para: Gets the data field that identifies the column/row where the processed cell resides.

member.value: A object that identifies the column where the processed cell resides.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPivotGrid.Export.WebCustomExportCellEventArgs.RowField

summary.para: Gets the row field that corresponds to the current cell.

member.value: A object that specifies the row field. null (Nothing in Visual Basic) if a row grand total cell is being processed.

summary.para: Represents an ASPxPivotGridExporter control used to export the ASPxPivotGrid control's data.
Initializes a new instance of the ASPxPivotGridExporter class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPivotGrid.Export.ASPxPivotGridExporter.ASPxPivotGridID

summary.para: Gets or sets the programmatic identifier of the associated ASPxPivotGrid control.

member.value: The programmatic identifier assigned to the ASPxPivotGrid control.

summary.para: Enables you to render a different content for individual cells.
Enables you to render a different content for individual field values.
Enables you to render a different content for individual field headers.
Releases all resources used by the current object.
This property isn't used.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPivotGrid.Export.ASPxPivotGridExporter.ExportCsvToResponse(System.String,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Exports the ASPxPivotGrid's data to the specified file in CSV format with the specified settings, and writes it to the response in the binary format.

member.param: A containing the full path (including the file name and extension) specifying the target file name.
true to display the Save As dialog; false to display the file with exported data within a page.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Web.ASPxPivotGrid.Export.ASPxPivotGridExporter.ExportXlsToResponse(System.String,DevExpress.XtraPrinting.TextExportMode,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Exports the ASPxPivotGrid's data to the specified file in XLS format with the specified export settings, and writes it to the response in the binary format.

member.param: A containing the full path (including the file name and extension) specifying the target file name.
A object that specifies whether to use the formatting of the data fields in the bound dataset for the cells in the exported XLS document.
true to display the Save As dialog; false to display the file with exported data within a page.
